casebody.data:
Stein et al., Respondents, v. Levy et al., Appellants. (Supreme Court, General Term, First Department. January 24, 1890.) Appeal from special term, New York county. For appeal from order denying motion to vacate attachment, see ante, 505.

Argued before Van Brunt, P. J„ and Brady and Daniels, JJ.

Mr. Fromme, for appellants. Mr. Loewy, for respondents. Per Curiam.

The attachment herein having been declared to have been improperly granted by decision handed down herewith, (ante, 505,) the order continuing injunction must be reversed and the injunction vacated, without costs, but with disbursements to respondents.
